Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X | GPU: Rtx 3070 Ti | RAM: 16gb

 

While on a recent trip to the Mun in the latest update (0.1.5.0), I noticed that the majority of the boulders appeared to be a far lower resolution model, as well as having some texturing issues. I probably would not have noticed this except that there were some much nicer looking boulders scattered among them, as well as many of the much smaller rocks having more detail than the large ones. I am wondering if the game is loading in a more distant LOD model while close up for some reason.  I have attached some screenshots showing the boulders up close, as well as some comparisons of the higher and lower resolution boulders directly next to each other.
